name: Presentations
tagline: You can find all my presentation slides here.
body:
# Welcome to my slides

I keep this repository mainly for my own use as a central hub for my slides. If you like my presentations and want to use a few slides in your own, I'd be glad if you kudos me, when you hold your own presentation :)

With no further ado ...

* [Presentation 1](#)
* [Presentation 2](#)
* [Presentation 3](#)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
